title: Amber Robe
summaries: The Amber Robe is an Armor item and part of the Wizard set, being wearable in the shirt slot. It is the second strongest Gem Robe, only being weaker than the Diamond Robe.

Wearing the Wizard Hat alongside the Amber Robe provides a set bonus of +10% magic critical strike chance while wearing a Magic Hat alongside it provides a set bonus of +60 Mana. Any leg-slot equipment can be worn with the set bonuses remaining intact.
